abstract: JPMorgan Chase and Wells Fargo may have beating analyst estimates. But their earnings results weren’t enough to prevent bank stocks from sagging on Friday.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase and Wells Fargo may have beating analyst estimates. But their earnings results weren’t enough to prevent bank stocks from sagging on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Congratulations to JPMorgan Chase and Wells Fargo for beating estimates. Yet, those earnings reports weren’t enough to prevent a sagging in bank stocks on Friday.

headline.main: Despite Good News, U.S. Bank Stocks Fall

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
